body_content.explanation: opposition to political systems based on communism (= the belief in a society without different social classes in which the methods of production are owned and controlled by all its members and everyone works as much as they can and receives what they need):
examples: This was a period of growing anti-communism, with the Eastern bloc crumbling.
the anti-communism of the Cold War era
McCarthy combined an intense anticommunism with support for racial desegregation.
